comments.author: Dr Ishmael.9685
comments.body:
Megaservers.

  • https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/community/api/Megaservers-and-API/first#post3915242
  • https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/community/api/Looks-like-some-of-the-API-is-broken/first#post4120297

The /v2 page is just a placeholder, there’s been no announcement on when (if ever) it will be activated.

comments.author: Deranged Hedgehog.9713
comments.body:
Just came back to gw after a 6-month break, and some of my old scripts don’t work

Looking at https://api.guildwars2.com/v1/:
…
/v1/events.json
…

(note: no [d])

however, if I access https://api.guildwars2.com/v1/events.json
{"error":51,product,module,line,“text”:“events.json disabled”}

the v2 one is disabled as well (but that one is actually marked as such in the /v2/ list, and trying to access https://api.guildwars2.com//v2/events produces {"text":“API not active”})

is this a bug? or are there plans to bring one or the other of them back up? or is there an announcement somewhere that I didn’t see?

thanks
